name.en: Grand Arrival of the Goblin Riders
name.ja: <ruby>百鬼羅刹<rt>ゴブリンライダー</rt></ruby><ruby>大<rt>だい</rt></ruby><ruby>参<rt>さん</rt></ruby><ruby>上<rt>じょう</rt></ruby>

text.en: Add 1 "Goblin" monster from your Deck to your hand, then you can detach 1 material from a monster on the field, and if you do, Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Goblin" monster from your hand. You can banish this card from your GY; detach 1 material from a monster on the field, then you can add 1 "Goblin" monster from your GY to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Grand Arrival of the Goblin Riders" once per turn.
